name: Alchemist's Stone
effect:
Alchemy Hero Required
[Activate] ==> Reveal the top card of your deck. You may discard a card with a different type. If you do, put that revealed card into hand.

name: Belt of Blasting
effect: X, Exhaust your hero ==> Your hero deals X arcane damage to target hero or ally.
"I always shoot from the hip." - Blaize Brightspark

name: Belt of Deep Shadow
effect:
Your hero has stealth.
If your hero would deal combat damage, it deals that much +2 instead.
"Take a breathâ€¦savor itâ€¦and then say farewell." - Dralor

name: Bindings of Lightning Reflexes
effect:
When you play an ability, put a bolt counter on Bindings of Lightning Reflexes.
Heroes and allies in combat with your hero have -1 ATK for each bolt counter.
"This fight is slipping away from you." - Kana Nassis

name: Black Felsteel Bracers
effect: [Activate] ==> Put a +1 ATK counter on target weapon.
Forging is complete when the anvil shatters.

name: Bracers of the Green Fortress
effect: Each of your face-down resources is also an armor with 1 DEF.
A stronghold without walls, guns, or towers.

name: Cobrascale Hood
effect: At the start of you turn, your hero deals 2 nature damage to each opposing hero for each face-up resource its controller has.
The mask hides the face of the snake-hearted; venomous and quick to strike.

name: Eternium Runed Blade
effect:
Players can't play allies.
Allies can't be destroyed.
"The deadliest weapon is one that ends a conflict." - Dizdemona

name: Felsteel Reaper
effect: Felsteel Reaper has +1 ATK for each resource you have.
It pierces through armor, flesh â€¦ and hope.

name: Girdle of Ruination
effect: At the start of your turn, destroy the ability, ally, or equipment with the lowest cost. If two or more are tied, destroy all with that cost.
"The discord woven between its threads does not distinguish between friend and foe." - Boris Brightbeard

name: Netherdrake Gloves
effect: [Activate], Destroy Netherdrake Gloves ==> Put a Netherdrake ally token with 3 ATK / 3 health into play.
Netherdrakes are notorious for their tenuous grasp on death.

name: Spellstrike Hood
effect: 2, [Activate] ==> When you next play a non-ongoing ability this turn, copy it. (You may choose new targets for the copy.)
"Twice the power for half the price." - Varanis Bitterstar

name: Swiftsteel Bracers
effect: You pay 5 less to strike with weapons.
"The armor is flawless. Perhaps your weapon is not." - Graccus

name: Talasite Owl
effect:
Jewelcrafting Hero Required
[Activate] ==> Put a hoot counter on Talasite Owl.
[Activate], Remove X hoot counters, destroy Talasite Owl ==> Ready X of your resources.
